commitMessage: @@@YARN-7477. Moving logging APIs over to slf4j in hadoop-yarn-common. Contributed by Prabhu Joseph.
@@@YARN-8995. Log events info in AsyncDispatcher when event queue size cumulatively reaches a certain number every time. Contributed by zhuqi.
@@@YARN-10642. Race condition: AsyncDispatcher can get stuck by the changes introduced in YARN-8995. Contributed by zhengchenyu.
@@@YARN-10739. GenericEventHandler.printEventQueueDetails causes RM recovery to take too much time. Contributed by Qi Zhu.
